##  Agile Consultancy

__

## Ahmedabad's No.1 Immigration & Study Visa Consultant

Agile Consultancy and International Services are providers of expert VISA
consultancy services and advice for Education (Study), Employment (USA H1B
Work Visa) , Immigration (permanent residence) & Business / Investor visa to
USA / CANADA / UK / AUSTRALIA / NEW ZEALAND / EUROPEN & many more countries.
With 18+ years of experience in this field Agile Consultancy has a placement
record of more than 10000+ qualified students & 3000+ skilled employees
Settled & placed in different countries.

__ About Us

## Our Process

__

At Agile Consultancy, we understand that navigating the visa application
process can be overwhelming. That’s why we’ve streamlined our approach to
ensure a seamless and stress-free experience for our clients. Our proven
process encompasses the following steps:

__

###  Initial Consultation

We begin by scheduling a comprehensive consultation session to understand your
specific goals, preferences, and requirements.

__

###  Customized Strategy Development

Based on the information gathered during the initial consultation, we develop
a customized strategy designed to maximize your chances of visa approval.

__

###  Documentation Assistance

We provide extensive support and guidance throughout the documentation
preparation process.

__

###  Follow-Up and Communication

Throughout the processing period, we maintain regular communication with the
authorities on your behalf, providing updates and addressing any queries or
concerns that may arise.

__

###  Outcome Notification

Upon receiving a decision on your visa application, we promptly inform you of
the outcome and provide guidance on the next steps, whether it be visa
issuance, further documentation requests, or appeal procedures.

__

###  Post-Visa Support

Our commitment to your success doesn't end with visa issuance. We continue to
offer support and guidance as you embark on your journey abroad, ensuring a
smooth transition and ongoing assistance with any challenges or concerns you
may encounter.

Kaushal Rathod

January 30, 2024

Thank you Agile Consultancy for your excellent service. Thank you kunal sir
and his team who are so helpful and loyal about their service. They always
answered all our questions and concern at all hours without getting annoyed 😊.
They explained well the whole process. They are really a blessing for me ,
that’s why I highly recommend agile consultancy to my friends and family who
is looking for a great migration agent. Keep up the good work Agile and keep
helping others to make their dreams be fulfilled here in USA.

#  Australia Student Visa

  * Home
  * Australia Student Visa

### Australia Student Visa Consultant in Ahmedabad

#### Study In Australia

Australia, the smallest continent and one of the largest countries on earth is
also a land full of great surprises. Experience some of the most fantastic
things and adventures that not only fulfill the inner travel thirst of your
soul but will also encourage you to live life at fullest. Agile Visa
Consultancy handles all your travel issues and makes your trip a lifetime
experience.

If you are dreaming to pursue your career at this amazing place and looking
for an **Australian student visa consultant in Ahmedabad** then apply for
student visa today and avail great benefits.

#### Why Study In Australia?

Australia is commonly known as a land of golden sands and to be on this
beautiful serene place one needs to go through strict immigration regulations
and obtain an **Australian student visa**. Following are a few factors that
make this place suitable for your education-

  * __ Globally accredited qualifications
  * __ Rights for overseas students
  * __ Linguistic diversity
  * __ Monetary aid from the Government
  * __ Steadily growing economy offering good job prospects
  * __ A degree that is valued globally
  * __ Amazing Climate & Lifestyle

#### Documents Required for Australia Student Visa

  * __ Valid Passport
  * __ Signed visa application form
  * __ Photographs
  * __ Covering letter stating the purpose and duration of stay
  * __ Detailed Itinerary 
  * __ Documents to prove financial status

We have a team of experienced visa specialists that will assist you in process
and submission of an **Australia Student Visa in Ahmedabad**.

#### Eligibility Requirement for Australia Study Visa

Studying in Australia offers a wealth of employment opportunities. With a
growing economy and a wide range of industries and sectors, Australia is an
attractive destination for international students. In order to work in
Australia, you must have a **valid australian student visa**. If you’re
looking for an **Australia student visa consultant in Ahmedabad** , then you
should contact Agile Visa Consultancy who can provide you with the best
services. We can provide you with all the information you require about the
visa process and the rules and regulations that apply to international
students.

Below are the criteria for Employment opportunities in Australia with Study

  * __ Students must have attained 18 years of age
  * __ International students in Australia can work for up to 20 hours per week
  * __ Academic assistants may work for an indefinite period
  * __ They are not allowed to work as freelancers

After graduation students can also apply for the Temporary Graduate visa
(subclass 485) which will be granted based on the coursework and the category
under which the student has applied.

#### Why Choose Agile Visa Consultancy for Australia Student Visa?

Thousands of students every year apply for student visa but not everyone gets
access to it. Agile Visa Consultancy services increases your chances by 60%
for approval of Australian student visa. We help you not only in applying for
visa services but also in accommodation and travelling. Following are a few
reasons that make us the leader of visa consultancy industry-

  * __ Personalized services as per your financial status and requirements
  * __ Agile Visa Consultancy also help you to crack an interview in the first attempt
  * __ Agile Visa Consultancy’s pre-designed catalogue of documents and requirement list, we can serve you without any delay
  * __ Agile Visa Consultancy has a team of highly qualified members that solve your queries with utter patience and honesty.
  * __ Agile Visa Consultancy is known for affordable range of services

Agile Visa Consultancy is well aware of the importance of education thus we
dedicatedly help you in getting Australia Student Visa in minimum time and
affordable prices.

Ready to study Down Under? Let our experienced Australia student visa
consultants in Ahmedabad guide you through the process and help you secure
your visa to study in Australia. With our personalized support and expertise,
we make the visa application process simple and stress-free. Contact us today
to learn more and start your journey to an Australian education!
